Reno.Br\u00fcka Theatre:
Brüka Theatre is a Reno-based theater group which was founded in 1992, and is one of the main live theaters in Northern Nevada.
Most plays by Bruka are produced on their Main Stage, but several other productions are held in Sub-Brüka, their venue for less traditional fare, and other special events. This theater also performs touring theater for children, such as an adaptation of James Thurber's Many Moons.
